name: search_related_sites
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool advanced_serp_operators.
Tool description: Real-Time & Accurate Advanced Search Engine Results. REST API for SERP and SEO data. - More at: bishopi.io
API description: Finds sites related to a specified URL using the Advanced SERP Operators API.

website.description: The URL of the website for which to find related sites.

location.description: The proxy location for the search. Supported countries are 'US', 'CA', 'IE', 'GB', 'FR', 'DE', 'SE', 'IN', 'JP', 'KR', 'SG', 'AU', 'BR'. Defaults to 'us'.

max_results.description: The maximum number of related sites to return. Defaults to 10.
